about_the_game:
A theme befitting of a king! The 10th track of the Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Mini-Album is one of the first tunes you'll hear right before picking the heroes King Arthur, Sir Lancelot, and Sir Perceval.

Don't miss out on this classic!
